name: Top Fuel 3D Drag Racing Sim
description:
Feel the need for speed? Then jump into the most realistic drag strip racing game available in the App Store and start driving a nitro burning top fuel dragster now!

Race down a 1/4 mile drag strip in a 8,000 hp 280 mph dragster simulator while competing against your friends, family, and even your worst nemesis for the lowest race time, fastest speed, and quickest reaction time in 3D!

Features:
• 1 player 2 player and autoplay modes
• Adaptive artificial intelligence auto racer
• Extremely realistic functionality
• Real nitro burning race car sounds
• Speed adjusted moving roadway
• Functional rear-view mirror
• Functioning dial tachometer
• 6 speed manual transmission
• Quarter-mile time display
• Reaction time display
• Gear number display
• Auto replay feature
• Speed display
• Real 3D game
• And more!

If you have always loved fast cars and competing for the top position, but owning a real race car just wasn’t part of the big picture, then experience the thrill of racing and excitement of competition with our popular racing app Top Fuel 3D!

Device Compatibility: For all iOS devices running iOS 8.0 and above.
